name: Lego Star Wars: The Last Jedi
name_original: Lego Star Wars: The Last Jedi
description:
Play through 5 action-packed levels in Lego Star Wars: The Last Jedi. Shoot stormtroopers along the way with your favorite blaster heroes, Poe, Finn, Rose, and many more. Encounter epic boss battles with Rey, Luke, and Finn. Getting tired of being the Resistance? Switch to the dark side with the new darkside-lightside function! Be favorites of the First Order, like Kylo Ren, projected on Atch-To or Kylo Ren on the planet, Crait! The galaxy is yours to bring home with this amazing Lego game!

Music by: John Williams
